name: Test Type Speed
description:
This Game can improve Your fast typing skills in training mode and check You abilities in Game.

Training (4 difficulties/6 tests):
★Shoot chars!
★Beat records!
★Pass test levels!

Game (speed increased steadily by 10 cpm):
★Destroy chars before they destroy you!
★Tap bonuses (life, slow, freeze, bomb, rewind chars)!
★Beat records!

Play with Your default Android keyboard or use game stylized keyboard!

Please rate by use expendable top left rate button in game menu!
See You in the Game!
